Getting started UI Components API Doc

Buttons

Default state

Disabled

How to use

Any button is created in 3 parts:

<dl class=”ch-list> <dt>Color</dt> <dd>Add ch-btn for default buttons, or ch-btn-skin for skin buttons.</dd> <dt>Size</dt> <dd>Optionally, include ch-btn-small or ch-btn-large to change the default size.</dd> <dt>Availability</dt> <dd>Optionally, include ch-btn-disabled to disable any button.</dd> </dl>

Examples

Default button:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn" value="Button"/>

Large button:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn ch-btn-large" value="Button Large"/>

With icon:

<button class="ch-btn-skin ch-btn-small"><i class="ch-icon-cog"></i> With icon</button>

Disabled:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn ch-btn-disabled" value="Disabled button"/>
